short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension which displays all the upcoming contests. Uses : 1. Saves Time. 2. Never forget to attend a contest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contest Tracker is a Chrome extension that makes the process of accessing coding contests from top platforms like LeetCode, CodeChef, Codeforces, AtCoder, and Coding Ninjas at one place. It presents all the essential details in a sleek, user-friendly interface, allowing you to effortlessly track contests, filter by platform, and access contest pages with a single click. Context Tracker saves you time and effort, providing a centralized hub for your competitive programming journey, enabling you to focus on honing your skills and conquering coding challenges.
